Test Description: Check basic SELECT query for patients API
Expected Results: Should return 3 selected fields from patients

Test Description: Check WHERE clause with condition for patients API

Request Body.pql: SELECT [patients.guarantor_id] FROM [patients] WHERE [patients.guarantor_id] IS NOT NULL

Expected Results: Should return records where guarantor_id meets the condition

Test Description: Check COUNT aggregate function for patients API
Expected Results: Should return COUNT of guarantor_primary_group_plan_number

Test Description: Check MIN aggregate function for patients API
Expected Results: Should return MIN of guarantor_primary_group_plan_number

Test Description: Check LIKE operator for patients API
Expected Results: Should return records where billing_type contains 'example'

Test Description: Check IN operator for patients API
Expected Results: Should return records where primary_medical_subscriber_id is in specified values

Test Description: Check BETWEEN operator for numeric field in patients API
Expected Results: Should return records where secondary_group_plan_number is between 100 and 1000

Test Description: Check BETWEEN operator for date field in patients API
Expected Results: Should return records where treatment_estimate_completion_date is in 2024

Test Description: Check ORDER BY for patients API
Expected Results: Should return records ordered by secondary_insurance_company_id in ascending order

Test Description: Check DISTINCT for patients API
Expected Results: Should return unique values of preferred_recall_method

Test Description: Check all fields can be selected from patients
Expected Results: Should return all 105 fields from patients table

Test Description: Check complex WHERE conditions for patients API

Request Body.pql: SELECT [patients.integration_ids], [patients.bill_type] FROM [patients] WHERE [patients.integration_ids] IS NOT NULL AND [patients.bill_type] = 'Active'

Expected Results: Should return records meeting both conditions on integration_ids and bill_type
